tool_description: This API analyzes the domain’s SSL configurations, Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) certificate, HTTP Strict Transport Security, TLS Authentication (TLSA),  and Online Certificate Status Protocol (OCSP)  and reveal potential inconsistencies and vulnerability.  It warns you if any parameter is not up to standards.
name: Website Safety & Security Check API
title: Website Safety & Security Check API

api_list.name: Website Safety & Security Check API
api_list.description:
This API analyzes the domain’s SSL configurations,
Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) certificate,
HTTP Strict Transport Security, TLS Authentication (TLSA), 
and Online Certificate Status Protocol (OCSP) 
and reveal potential inconsistencies and vulnerability. 
It warns you if any parameter is not up to standards.
